targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query: SELECT uptime()
targets.rawQuery: SELECT uptime()

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    database,
    table,
    partition,
    name,
    part_type,
    rows,
    bytes_on_disk,
    data_compressed_bytes
FROM $table

WHERE database!='system'
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    database,
    table,
    partition,
    name,
    part_type,
    rows,
    bytes_on_disk,
    data_compressed_bytes
FROM system.parts

WHERE database!='system'

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    name as Name,
    path as Path,
    free_space as Free,
    total_space as Total,
    1 - free_space/total_space as Used
FROM $table
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    name as Name,
    path as Path,
    free_space as Free,
    total_space as Total,
    1 - free_space/total_space as Used
FROM system.disks

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    value as ReplicasMaxAbsoluteDelay
FROM $table

WHERE metric='ReplicasMaxAbsoluteDelay'
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    value as ReplicasMaxAbsoluteDelay
FROM system.asynchronous_metrics

WHERE metric='ReplicasMaxAbsoluteDelay'

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

SELECT
    value as ReplicasMaxRelativeDelay
FROM $table

WHERE metric='ReplicasMaxRelativeDelay'
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    value as ReplicasMaxRelativeDelay
FROM system.asynchronous_metrics

WHERE metric='ReplicasMaxRelativeDelay'

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    value as ReplicasMaxQueueSize
FROM $table

WHERE metric='ReplicasMaxQueueSize'
targets.rawQuery:

    value as ReplicasMaxQueueSize

WHERE metric='ReplicasMaxQueueSize'

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    database as DatabaseName,
    name as TableName,
    total_rows as TotalRows,
    total_bytes as TotalBytes
FROM $table

WHERE database !='system'
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    database as DatabaseName,
    name as TableName,
    total_rows as TotalRows,
    total_bytes as TotalBytes
FROM system.tables

WHERE database !='system'

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    database as DatabaseName,
    table as TableName,
    count(1) as ColumnCnt
FROM $table
WHERE database!='system'
GROUP BY DatabaseName, TableName
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    database as DatabaseName,
    table as TableName,
    count(1) as ColumnCnt
FROM system.columns
WHERE database!='system'
GROUP BY DatabaseName, TableName

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    database DatabaseName,
    name DictionnaryName,
    status Status,
    type Type,
    bytes_allocated,
    query_count,
    element_count,
    hit_rate,
    load_factor
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 4) * 4) * 1000 as t,
    CurrentMetric_MemoryTracking
FROM system.metric_log
WHERE event_date >= toDate(1609221187) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1609221187)
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery:
$rateColumns(
    substring(query,  1,  45) AS query,
    count() c)
FROM $table
WHERE
    cityHash64(query) global in (
    SELECT cityHash64(substring(query,  1,  45)) AS h
    FROM $table
    WHERE
        $timeFilter
        AND type in ($type)
        AND initial_user in ($user)
        AND('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
    GROUP BY h
    ORDER BY count() desc
    LIMIT $top)
    AND type in ($type)
    AND initial_user in ($user)
    AND('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
targets.query:
$rateColumns(
    substring(query,  1,  45) AS query,
    count() c)
FROM $table
WHERE
    cityHash64(query) global in (
    SELECT cityHash64(substring(query,  1,  45)) AS h
    FROM $table
    WHERE
        $timeFilter
        AND type in ($type)
        AND initial_user in ($user)
        AND('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
    GROUP BY h
    ORDER BY count() desc
    LIMIT $top)
    AND type in ($type)
    AND initial_user in ($user)
    AND('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT t, arrayMap(a -> (a.1, a.2/runningDifference( t/1000 )), groupArr) FROM (SELECT t, groupArray((query, c)) AS groupArr FROM ( SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 2) * 2) * 1000 AS t, substring(query, 1, 45) AS query, count() c FROM system.query_log
WHERE event_date >= toDate(1603862271) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1603862271) AND
    cityHash64(query) global in (
    SELECT cityHash64(substring(query,  1,  45)) AS h
    FROM system.query_log
    WHERE
        event_date >= toDate(1603862271) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1603862271)
        AND type in (1,2,3,4)
        AND initial_user in ('default')
        AND('all' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'all') = 1))
    GROUP BY h
    ORDER BY count() desc
    LIMIT 30)
    AND type in (1,2,3,4)
    AND initial_user in ('default')
    AND('all' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'all') = 1)) GROUP BY t, query ORDER BY t, query) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t)

panels.title: Top $top request's rate by type: $type; user: $user; query type: $query_type

panels.content:
1 - successful start of query execution

2 - successful end of query execution

3 - exception before start of query execution

4 - exception while query execution
panels.title: Types

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    rand() as t,
    substring(query,  1,  70) AS query,
    avg(query_duration_ms) duration,
    count() count
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
GROUP BY query
ORDER BY duration desc
LIMIT $top
targets.query:
SELECT
    rand() as t,
    substring(query,  1,  70) AS query,
    avg(query_duration_ms) duration,
    count() count
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
GROUP BY query
ORDER BY duration desc
LIMIT $top
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     rand() as t,     substring(query,  1,  70) AS query,     avg(query_duration_ms) duration,     count() count FROM system.query_log WHERE     event_date >= toDate(1498209947) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1498209947)     AND type in (1,2,3,4)     and initial_user in ('default')     and('all' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'all') = 1)) GROUP BY query ORDER BY duration desc LIMIT 5

panels.title: Top slow queries by type: $type; user: $user; query type: $query_type

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    rand() as t,
    substring(query,  1,  70) AS query,
    avg(memory_usage) usage,
    count() count
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
GROUP BY query
ORDER BY usage desc
LIMIT $top
targets.query:
SELECT
    rand() as t,
    substring(query,  1,  70) AS query,
    avg(memory_usage) usage,
    count() count
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
GROUP BY query
ORDER BY usage desc
LIMIT $top
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     rand() as t,     substring(query,  1,  70) AS query,     avg(memory_usage) usage,     count() count FROM system.query_log WHERE     event_date >= toDate(1498209947) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1498209947)     AND type in (1,2,3,4)     and initial_user in ('default')     and('all' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'all') = 1)) GROUP BY query ORDER BY usage desc LIMIT 5

panels.title: Top memory consumers by type: $type; user: $user; query type: $query_type

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    rand() as t,
    substring(query,  1,  70) AS query,
    type,
    count() count
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type in (3,4)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
GROUP BY
    query,
    type
ORDER BY count desc
LIMIT $top
targets.query:
SELECT
    rand() as t,
    substring(query,  1,  70) AS query,
    type,
    count() count
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type in (3,4)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
GROUP BY
    query,
    type
ORDER BY count desc
LIMIT $top
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     rand() as t,     substring(query,  1,  70) AS query,     type,     count() count FROM system.query_log WHERE     event_date >= toDate(1498209947) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1498209947)     AND type in (3,4)     and initial_user in ('default')     and('all' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'all') = 1)) GROUP BY     query,     type ORDER BY count desc LIMIT 5

panels.title: Top failed queries by user: $user; query type: $query_type

targets.formattedQuery:
$rate(count() c)
FROM $table
where  type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
targets.query:
$rate(count() c)
FROM $table
where  type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(toDateTime(concat(substr(toString(event_time), 1, 16), ':00'))), 2) * 2) * 1000 as t,
    avg(ProfileEvent_MergedRows) as ProfileEvent_MergedRows
FROM system.metric_log

WHERE event_time >= toDateTime(1609221193)

GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t

panels.title: Reqs/s by type: $type; user: $user; query type: $query_type

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    avg(query_duration_ms)  select_duration
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type = 2
    and positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'select') = 1
    and initial_user in ($user)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    avg(query_duration_ms)  select_duration
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type = 2
    and positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'select') = 1
    and initial_user in ($user)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 4) * 4) * 1000 as t,
    avg(query_duration_ms)  select_duration
FROM system.query_log
WHERE
    event_date >= toDate(1608193103) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1608193103)
    AND type = 2
    and positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'select') = 1
    and initial_user in ('u_ops','default')
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    avg(query_duration_ms) insert_duration
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type = 2
and positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'insert into') = 1
    and initial_user in ($user)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    avg(query_duration_ms) insert_duration
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type = 2
and positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'insert into') = 1
    and initial_user in ($user)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 4) * 4) * 1000 as t,
    avg(query_duration_ms) insert_duration
FROM system.query_log
WHERE
    event_date >= toDate(1608193175) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1608193175)
    AND type = 2
and positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'insert into') = 1
    and initial_user in ('u_ops','default')
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    event_time,
    user,
    query_duration_ms duration,
    memory_usage memory,
    if(exception!='', 'fail', 'success') result,
    concat(substring(query,1,120), '...') query
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
    AND type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
ORDER BY event_time DESC
LIMIT 1000
targets.query:
SELECT
    event_time as EventTime,
    concat(substring(query,1,120), '...') Query,
    if(exception!='', 'fail', 'success') Result,
    user as Operator,
    query_duration_ms as Duration,
    memory_usage as Memory,
    read_rows as ReadRows,
    read_bytes as ReadBytes
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
    AND type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
ORDER BY EventTime DESC
LIMIT 1000
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 2) * 2) * 1000 as t,
    ProfileEvent_MergedRows
FROM system.metric_log

WHERE event_time >= toDateTime(1608193667)

panels.title: Query log by type: $type; user: $user; query type: $query_type

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    event_time as EventTime,
    substring(query, 1, 140) as Query,
    user as Operator,
    query_duration_ms as Duration,
    read_rows as ReadRows,
    read_bytes as ReadBytes

FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter

ORDER BY Duration DESC

LIMIT $top

FROM system.metric_log

ORDER BY t

list.definition: select distinct initial_user from system.query_log where event_date >= today()-3 and event_time > toDateTime(today()-3)
list.label: initial user
list.name: user
list.query: select distinct initial_user from system.query_log where event_date >= today()-3 and event_time > toDateTime(today()-3)
